comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model QueueStatus adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/QueueStatus/schema.json
description: Property. Information about the status of a Passenger Queue. Values can be: Open, Closed.

contents.name: Name
contents.comment: Unique name for the status of the Passenger Queue.
